participant_abstract.sent: In this meeting we discussed the final disain issues, and evaluated the prototype.
Then we calculated the production costs.
It turned out that the estimated production costs were over the budject.
Therefore, we had to slightly simplify the design, and removed some of the advanced, but non too necessary features - scroll button and the voice sampler.
Since the voice sampler was also ment to be used when locating the remote control, we had to provide an alternative solution.
We decided that it would just beep when the locator button that can be attched to the TV (or anywhere else for that matter) is pressed.
The whole group was very satisfied with the design of the prototype.
We expect the product to be great success.

participant_actions.sent: We have handed over the responsibilities to the manufacturing division of the company.
The members of the project will be working on other projects.

participant_decisions.sent: Keep the production costs within the budget.
Replace the scroll button for volume with two simpler buttons (louder/quieter).
Due to the constraints of the budget not include the sample speaker.
